mapper.select: select no, title, contents, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate, category_no as categoryNo from post where category_no = #{_parameter} order by no desc

choose.when: select no, title, contents, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate, category_no as categoryNo from post where no = -1
choose.otherwise: select no, title, contents, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate, category_no as categoryNo from post where no = #{_parameter}

mapper.delete: delete from post where category_no = (select no from category where no = #{categoryNo} and blog_id = #{blogId}) and no = #{postNo}
